title: Parity Conservation
alt: Bloody Mary is made of antimatter. It explains so much.
transcript:
[Cueball is standing in front of an oval wall mirror hanging over a small table.  He's holding a tube connected to an electronic device.  A face is dimly reflected in the mirror.]Cueball: Listen, I know I said your name three times.Cueball: But before you come out of the mirror and murder me, can you hold this cobalt-60 and take some measurements?Cueball: See, I'm researching parity conservation...[Caption below the comic]:
It took some negotiating, but I've finally become the first person to coauthor a paper with Bloody Mary.
